name: @fivetrandevelopers/zetasql-snowflake
description: ZetaSQL Snowflake gRPC server and client

scripts.build:server: mkdir -p lib/snowflake && tar -xzvf bin/darwin-x86-64/remote_server.tar.gz -C lib/snowflake && tar -xzvf bin/darwin-arm-64/remote_server_arm.tar.gz -C lib/snowflake && tar -xzvf bin/linux-x86-64/remote_server.so.tar.gz -C lib/snowflake && tar -xzvf bin/linux-arm-64/remote_server_arm.so.tar.gz -C lib/snowflake && cp -R src/snowflake/protos lib/snowflake/protos
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build
